original_text: But the Lord had told Ahijah, “Jeroboam’s wife is coming to ask you about her son, for he is ill, and you are to give her such and such an answer. When she arrives, she will pretend to be someone else.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 아히야에게 이르시되 여로보암의 아내가 자기 아들이 병 들었으므로 네게 물으러 오나니 너는 이러이러하게 대답하라 그가 들어올 때에 다른 사람인 체함이니라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord had told Ahijah
Jeroboam's wife is coming to ask you
sentences.korean_translation: 여로보암의 아내가 너에게 질문하러 오고 있다

sentences.original_text: and you are to give her such and such an answer
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 그녀에게 어떤 대답을 주어야 한다

sentences.original_text: she will pretend to be someone else
